int cvm_ModExp (  uint64_t *    product,
uint64_t *    base,
uint64_t *    exponent,
uint64_t *    mod,
int    len,
int    elen,
int    mlen,
int    blen
) 
 

Modular Exponentiation ME = b ^ e mod m NOTE : 1.There must be at least one bit set in the most-significant word of the modulus.

The modulus must be odd. 2. The exponent and base lengths must be less than to the modulus length. 3. modulus length from 9 to 256 bytes is supported.

Parameters:
product  Output buffer of size mlen
base  base
exponent  exponent
mod  modulus
len  len in 192 bit words
elen  length of exponent in bytes
mlen  length of modulus in bytes
blen  length of base in bytes

int cvm_ModExpCrt (  uint64_t *    product,
uint64_t *    base,
cvm_rsa_key_t *    rkey,
int    nonwalign
) 
 

int N3Random (  int    len,
uint8_t *    output
) 
 

Generates Random number of given length.

Parameters:
len  Size of random number required in Bytes
output  Output where random number is stored
Returns:
length of random bytes generated on Success
